name: Katars

nlight.desc: Two broad vertical slices with both katars, up then down. Carries the Legend forward a very short distance. Hitting with either slice results in a third upwards slice as a follow-up.

slight.desc: A lunging forward roll, katars-forward. Extremely short range, but carries the Legend forward a good distance.

dlight.desc: A quick jumping uppercut slice with one katar. Hits close and high, lifting targets up into the air. Little force.

nair.desc: A fast all-around spin with both katars extended. Hits in short, broad arcs both above and below.

sair.desc: A broad, lunging forward swipe with one katar. Carries the Legend forward a short distance.

dair.desc: A downwards, diagonal dive with both katars extended forward. Extremely short range, but travels a long distance. Damages with multiple small hits.

recovery.desc: A drilling diagonal dive up and forward with both katars extended. Extremely short range, but travels a long distance. Enemies are carried along for the rest of the dive and launched up and away.

gp.desc: A plummeting swan-dive directly downwards, ending in a single downwards slash with a katar.
